name: easy-date
description: EasyDate is a Javascript extension for easy dates manipulations which is heavily inspired by Rails ActiveSupport::Duration class.
author: Melvin Sembrano <melvinsembrano@gmail.com> (https://github.com/melvinsembrano/easy-date)

scripts.tagRelease: PKGV=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PKGV
scripts.publishRelease: git push origin master && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.commit: PKGV=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git commit bower.json easy-date.min.js easy-date-light.min.js package.json -m "Release v$PKGV"
